name: Modmail
description: An easy to install Modmail bot for Discord - DM to contact mods!

GUILD_ID.description: The id for the server you are hosting this bot for.

MODMAIL_GUILD_ID.description: The ID of the discord server where the threads channels should be created (receiving server). Default to GUILD_ID.

OWNERS.description: Comma separated user IDs of people that are allowed to use owner only commands. (eval).

CONNECTION_URI.description: The connection URI for your database.

DATABASE_TYPE.description: The type of your database. There is only one supported database at the moment - MongoDB (default).

LOG_URL.description: The url of the log viewer app for viewing self-hosted logs.

LOG_URL_PREFIX.description: The path to your log viewer extending from your `LOG_URL`, defaults to "/logs".

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: A github personal access token with the repo scope.

REGISTRY_PLUGINS_ONLY.description: If set to true, only plugins that are in the registry can be loaded.

OAUTH2_CLIENT_ID.description: Client ID for your application, used for built-in logviewer plugin.

OAUTH2_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Client Secret for your application, used for built-in logviewer plugin.

OAUTH2_REDIRECT_URI.description: The redirect URL for logviewer OAuth. You must also add this URL in your application's Redirects section.

HOST.description: The host address logviewer plugin will bind itself to. Defaults to 0.0.0.0

PORT.description: The port logviewer plugin will listen to. Defaults to 8000.

LOGVIEWER_PAGINATION.description: The number of logs to display per page on logviewer. Defaults to 25.
